pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'shiny' Application for the (Audio-)Visualization of Adverse Event Profiles // Contains a 'shiny' application called AdEPro (Animation of Adverse Event Profiles) which (audio-)visualizes adverse events occurring in clinical trials. As this data is usually considered sensitive, this tool is provided as a stand- alone application that can be launched from any local machine on which the data is stored.
